ygData.subject: Re: Quick Keys/Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: The advantage is in twisting. Instead of moving the mouse and clicking - esp hard during some mage spells due to screen saturation. You just hit a number key -
ygData.messageBody:
The advantage is in twisting.

Instead of moving the mouse and clicking - esp hard during some mage
spells due to screen saturation.

You just hit a number key -
when I twist I have say - Antham on #3 Bellow #5 and protection #2
it goes something like this
hit 3 - wait for 5 secs - see the blue text
hit 5 hit 5 - wait 5 secs - see the blue text
hit 2 hit 2 - wait 5 secs - see the blue text
hit 3 hit 3 ....

You get the timing down after only a couple battles, you stop even
having to see the text saying your song is in effect. --- WAY better
than mouse clicking.

Samiba Craftsman

--- "Daniel P. Sniderman" <slide@...> wrote:
> I've seen people mention they have songs on the
> quick buttons. I'm wondering what the advantages of
> this over using the standards spell slots along the
> top side of the screen. Is it just personal
> preference - or is there in fact an advantage?
> Maybe its just habits. I didn't know about the
> quick-keys doing anything but holding "abilities"
> until about level 8 and got used to clicking songs
> in the above slots...
>
> Slyde of Xegony
> Level 18
>
